    <p><b>Cut-Off</b></p>

<ul>
    <li>Goods inwards notes;</li>
    <li>Goods outwards notes;</li>
    <li>Goods returned notes;</li>
    <li>Purchase invoices;</li>
    <li>Sales invoices;</li>
    <li>Credit notes; and</li>
    <li>Purchase orders.</li>
</ul>

    ⇄⧉
    question => UTF-8 string (1293) " <p>Summarise the adequacy and effectiveness of the client’s inventory count...
    $value[17]['question']
    <p>Summarise the adequacy and effectiveness of the client’s inventory count procedures by preparing a report in respect of each location visited, which should include the following:</p>
<ul>
    <li>What is your opinion of the capability of the individuals responsible for organising inventory-taking?</li>
    <li>Were assistants properly organised and briefed?</li>
    <li>Were instructions adequate? (If instructions were verbal, attach a brief summary of inventory count procedures)</li>
    <li>Was inventory arranged so as to make inventory identification and counting efficient and straightforward?</li>
    <li>Were inventory counters generally familiar with the inventory that they were counting?</li>
    <li>What precautions were taken to prevent misdescription of the quantity units (e.g. 1 box of 10 machines recorded as 10 boxes, or imperial measurements being recorded as metric?)</li>
    <li>Describe the methods used to identify and quantify obsolete, surplus and damaged inventories?</li>
    <li>What is your opinion on the general reliability of the inventory count?</li>
    <li>What changes would you recommend for improving future inventory counts at this location?  Have these been included in the management letter worksheet if appropriate?</li>
</ul>
